title: Person of Interest - Good Samaritan?
author: IGN
comment: One of the best series .. but it's underrated
All the people here with the LOST referrences who haven't seen this series yet... I feel sad for you guys!! You don't know what you are missing out on. Finch > Linus every day of the week.
He would make a great Joker
I've sent john to investigate lost reminiscent
description: Finch (Michael Emerson) and Shaw (Sarah Shahi) debate whether Samaritan is doing anything positive in this clip from the December 16th episode.
